```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

### Number of animals Seen
```{r}
data <- read.csv("data/observations_2022.csv")
data %>%
    group_by(RTU) %>% filter(RTU != "none") %>%
    summarise(count=n())
```
### Capture Rate
```{r}

n_total <- nrow(data)
n_hit <- data %>%
  filter(animal != 0) %>%
  nrow()

percent_capture <- (n_hit/n_total)*100

n_total ###Total Photos
n_hit   ###Total Hits
percent_capture ### Percent Capture Rate
```
